title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 153.1 - Scope of the part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 153.1 - Scope of the part

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to implement a provision of
chapter 1 of the Laws of 1974, to provide financial assistance to the City

School District of the City of New York during the 1973-74 school year for the
continuation of three school-community interaction umbrella programs, known as
"Umbrella 2-- Curriculum and Teacher Growth", "Umbrella 4--Basic Skills" and
"Umbrella 5-- Communications", and their components, subject to regulations
promulgated by the Commissioner of Education and the board of education of such
school district. Funds appropriated by the Legislature for the purposes of this

Part shall be apportioned to such school district in accordance with the
provisions of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
153.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
